duplicatedNameDescription: Names must not be used twice.
nameTooFewPlayersDescription:
At least 2 names must be entered.
Tip: Find a few friends.
nameTooManyPlayersDescription:
Only a maximum of 12 players are allowed. 
Tip: Create Teams!
neverHaveIEverExplanation: If you've ever done it, you must drink!
bigBrainQuizExplanation: If you know it then distribute, otherwise drink it yourself!
guessingExplanation: Whoever is closest to the solution gets to distribute!
guessTheSongExplanation: Whoever guesses the song first gets to distribute!
whoWouldRatherExplanation: Point to the person who is most likely to do it. The person must then drink!
exitDescription: Are you sure you want to quit the game?
goOnDescription: You've already played 50 questions! Do you want to go on?
challengesText2: You can use the variables %player, %amountbeer and %amountshots.
spotifyLongLoad: Spotify playlists can sometimes take longer to load.
adsNoVideosDescription: There are currently no more videos available. Try again later.
adVideoAbortDescription: You must watch the video until the end! No skipping allowed!
adSuccessDescription:
You may spend the next hour in the app free of advertising.
Thanks a lot bro.
mainAdDialogDescription:
Would you like to watch a short video to remove the advertisements for 1 hour?

Tip: You can also do this at any time in the settings.
splash: Use alcohol responsibly. We assume no liability, so don't take it too far!
spotifyGenericError: This Spotify Playlist could not be found. Make sure the playlist is public.
deactivateAdsDescription: watch a short video and disable advertising for an hour
deactivateAdsText:
Watch a 30-second video,
to disable advertising for 1h
adsAlreadyDisabled:
Advertising has already been disabled!
But you can still watch another video.
licensesDescription: Info about us and about the software we used!
